entry.title: $2025 // East Harlem 6 Train NO FEE One Bedroom Unit w/ Laundry Huge Closet!!!
entry.content:
Qualifications PLEASE READ:

- $95 tenant screen per applicant
- Total Move-in Cost $4050
- NO BROKER'S FEE
- Income 40 X Rent Amount (Total gross income of $80K+)
- Credit Scores must be 650+
- No evictions or judgments allowed.
- Available ASAP

$95 application fee per applicant. Building is pet friendly! This building welcomes dogs and cats No FEE. Tenants responsible for cooking gas and electricity. There is NO broker's fee. I would love to help you settle into your new apartment. Do not hesitate to call me! John B show contact info or feel free to email me show contact info. I'm looking forward to hearing from you!
do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers
